description:
Dynamic design gives these intuitive freeride bindings some extra oomph. Charge the descent with power thanks to a forward pressure and wide mount. No need to ski with your toes locked out, sleek toe jaw dynamics squeeze your boot with high force and absorb significant energy. Step-in and brake features deliver real rip-and-ride performance in a seriously light package. Freeride performance provides more power and a consistent release. Only a single tool is needed for mounts and adjustments, and a tried and true, fully retractable brake works for even bigger freeride skis.

  • High and wide fulcrum position for toe arms squeeze your boot tight and absorb more energy so you can power up easily
  • Forward pressure absorbs energy and vibrations at high speeds and on landings
  • Wide freeride mount transfers power to edges and enhances the rigidity of the binding for superior pull-out resistance
  • Snow clearing channel prevents snow buildup and avoids unwanted pre-releases
  • QuickFlick heel lifts are easy to grab with pole or hand for quick exits and uphill travel
  • Heel rotation turns in either direction to lock for touring with either hand; no “wrong way” to spin it
  • A single tool (Pozi Drive #3) is needed for all mounts and adjustments– no need for a heel spacer
  • Fully retractable and spring-loaded brake stops even big freeride skis
  • Heel anti-friction device ensures consistent release
  • 22mm length adjustability
name: G3 Ion 12 Bindings With Brakes - Unisex
